metadata.Title: CVE-2021-37600 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - low
metadata.Description: ** DISPUTED ** An integer overflow in util-linux through 2.37.1 canpotentially cause a buffer overflow if an attacker were able to use systemresources in a way that leads to a large number in the /proc/sysvipc/semfile. NOTE: this is unexploitable in GNU C Library environments, andpossibly in all realistic environments.

criterions.comment: util-linux: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
util-linux: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
